OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupBiomesOPlenty
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Biomes O Plenty Ores.

Choice.description: EnderAmathyst is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: boplEnderAmathystFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Biomes O Plenty EnderAmathyst distributions

OptionNumeric.name: boplEnderAmathystSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Biomes O Plenty EnderAmathyst distributions

Choice.description: Ruby is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: boplRubyFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Ruby distributions

OptionNumeric.name: boplRubySize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Ruby distributions

Choice.description: Peridot is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: boplPeridotFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Peridot distributions

OptionNumeric.name: boplPeridotSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Peridot distributions

Choice.description: Topaz is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: boplTopazFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Topaz distributions

OptionNumeric.name: boplTopazSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Topaz distributions

Choice.description: Tanzanite is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: boplTanzaniteFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Tanzanite distributions

OptionNumeric.name: boplTanzaniteSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Tanzanite distributions

Choice.description: Malachite is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: boplMalachiteFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Malachite distributions

OptionNumeric.name: boplMalachiteSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Malachite distributions

OptionNumeric.name: boplAmberSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Biomes O Plenty Amber distributions

Substitute.name: boplOverworldOreSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: boplRuby0Veins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Veins.name: boplRuby1Veins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

Cloud.name: boplRuby0Cloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: boplRuby0HintVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Cloud.name: boplRuby1Cloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: boplRuby1HintVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

StandardGen.name: boplRuby1Standard
StandardGen.Description: This mimics vanilla ore generation. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.
